articles.title: Germany confirms it will provide Ukraine with Leopard 2 tanks - BBC
articles.description: Russia has downplayed the impact of the move, saying Western tanks will 'burn like all the rest' .
articles.content: After weeks of reluctance, Germany has agreed to send Leopard 2 tanks to Ukraine, in what Kyiv hopes will be a game-changer on the battlefield. Chancellor Olaf Scholz announced the decision to send … [+4355 chars]

articles.title: Amazon strikes: Workers claim robots are treated better - BBC
articles.description: As Amazon's first ever UK strike gets under way, staff in Coventry tell the BBC why they are walking out.
articles.content: Amazon workers are staging the first ever UK strike against the online giant on Wednesday in a protest over pay. Members of the GMB union are walking out at Amazon's Coventry warehouse over what the… [+6571 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk Removes BBC Doc at Request of India PM Modi - The Intercept
articles.description: Officials from India’s ruling right-wing party said American tech companies like Twitter and YouTube complied with demands to remove the documentary.
articles.content: Twitter and YouTube censored a report critical of Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi in coordination with the government of India. Officials called for the Big Tech companies to take action agains… [+7160 chars]
